text: aur jab unase kaha jaata hai ki allaah ne jo utaara[1] hai, usapar eeman lao, to kahate hain: ham to useepar eemaan rakhate hain, jo hamapar utara hai aur isake siva jo kuchh hai, usaka inkaar karate hain. jabaki vah saty hai aur usaka pramaankaaree hai, jo unake paas hai. kaho ki phir isase poorv allaah ke nabiyon kee hatya kyon karate the, yadi tum eemaan vaale the to
